text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Uooooooo~! SHE. IS. WAY. TOO. COOOOOOL!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: This is a Major race though! And to finish it with more than a 10 length margin?!
I'm surprised too! To think her running style would have results like this…!
I'm surprised too! To think her running style would have results like this…!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: It's possible, that we also have this possibility… we may have one-sidely accepted as impossible, things that are actually possible.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Uoooooooo!! For some reason, I really want to run now! Do you think they'll allow a run-in participation for the last race!?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: At this point that's probably impossible, but I know exactly how you feel.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Seriously… she's shown us a run that can't be called anything else other than a dream, hasn't she?
And showing us that incredible run, Silence Suzuka's [Kinko Sho]-
Not only surpassed the fans' expectations, but the Uma Musume were also shown a dream.

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: Who would have thought she could show us a race better than the last?!

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: Yeah, yeah! I wonder what kind of race she'll show us next time!

text_block_list.name: Spectator C
text_block_list.text: As I thought, Silence Suzuka is just on another level compared to a normal Uma Musume!
Perhaps she is… what I have been desperately searching for this whole time…
